name: Tank Game (itch) (Sp1ceForce)
description:
Small indie game where you play as a tank trying to escape "THE FIRE WALL OF DEATH", you need to kill enemies, collect coins, buy upgrades and try to go further and further.

Controls: 

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left mouse button
  • Open shop - E on special areas
